text.textblock: is published pursuant to Section 3(a) of the Government in the Sunshine Act (Pub. L. No. 94-409), U.S.C. 552b:

footnote.textblock: The Commission meeting has been changed to 2:00 p.m.

date.textblock: 825 North Capitol Street NE., room 9306, Washington, DC 20426.
_Items listed on the agenda may be deleted without further notice.
Lois D. Cashell, Secretary, Telephone (202) 208-0400. For a recording listing items stricken from or added to the meeting, call (202) 208-1627.

This is a list of matters to be considered by the Commission. It does not include a listing of all papers relevant to the items on the agenda; however, all public documents may be examined in the Reference and Information Center.
